item.title: MANOVA Analysis: Unveiling Multivariate Patterns with R and Python
item.description: MANOVA (Multivariate analysis of variance) is an extension of ANOVA (Analysis of Variance) technique, which is used to compare means across different groups for a single dependent variable. In MANOVA, the dependent variables are correlated, and the analysis takes into account their…
